posts.post_title: T206 Chance Yellow Portrait and Davidson for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Korey
Working on getting pictures of JUST these two cards but having some scanner problems at the moment.

I have a T206 Frank Chance yellow portrait with Sweet Caporal back.  It was once glued to the inside of a trunk so the back has some paper loss..


I also have a Davidson portrait with Tolstoi back graded 2.

Looking for offers or trades for other T206 cards
